title: Math Kernel Library
summary: Intel oneAPI Math Kernel Library (Intel oneMKL; formerly Intel Math Kernel Library  or Intel MKL) is a library of optimized math routines for science, engineering, and financial applications. Core math functions include BLAS, LAPACK, ScaLAPACK, sparse solvers, fast Fourier transforms, and vector math.[5][6] That is besides the math.h standard C library, that is also more accurate compared to glibc.[7]
